name.str: Haley Strategic D3CR X chest rig

description: A compact and minimal chest rig.  The trade-off for comfort of use is minimal space for pouches.  The rig requires a QASM buckle panel or a hook-and-loop panel attached to be useful.
//weight: manufacturer states weight of the rig itself (straps + panel) to be 8.4 oz ≈ 238 g

we add 5 g × (4 + 2) = 30 g for the 4 female buckles included with the rig kit (source for weight/dimensions) and the two other QASM (female) ones on the X-harness, as visible on pictures of the rig itself, presuming that their weight is not included

notes: it may be possible to get a more-accurate estimate from directly measuring the parts of the rig kit

//longest_side: since 9 in. (presumed length of harness straps) folded three times (the default way of measuring longest side for Frontier Mods' soft/foldable items) is only 1.1875 in. ≈ 30 mm
6.25 in. (presumed width of the non-foldable rig panel) ≈ 159 mm is much longer than folded straps

//coverage: half of large SAPI plate coverage = 18%

armor.//coverage: half of large SAPI plate coverage ≈ 6%

pocket_data.//min_item_length: makes sure that only full hook-and-loop panels could be attached to the rig
